news.content:
ThreeFold Grid 2.3 is LIVE on mainnet!

The release introduces some improvements to the grid‚Äôs stability, new features, and testnet resource additions.

Read the TF Grid 2.3 official release note for more info.

Many thanks to the development team who made this release happen! üëè
news.excerpt: The release introduces some improvements to the grid‚Äôs stability, new features, and testnet resource additions. You can read more within!

previous.title: ThreeFold Now Marketplace is coming soon!
previous.excerpt: ThreeFold Now Marketplace is a peer-to-peer alternative to centralized cloud providers, enabling you to deploy independently and keep ownership of your own data. üôå Read more within.

next.title: ThreeFold @ Odyssey Momentum 2020!
next.excerpt: Momentum is an online event of 49 hours with more than 2,000 participants and 105 teams working on 21 complex 21st-century problems.
